sentence.value: Pedro Duque Duque (born 14 March 1963) is a Spanish astronaut and a veteran of two space missions.

sentence.value: He worked for GMV and for the European Space Agency (ESA) for six years before being selected as an astronaut candidate in 1992.
sentence.annotated-sentence: He worked for [[GMV|GMV_Innovating_Solutions]] and for [[the European Space Agency|European_Space_Agency]] ([[ESA|European_Space_Agency]]) for [[six years|Year]] before being selected as an [[astronaut|Astronaut]] [[candidate|Candidate]] in [[1992|1992]].
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: He worked for GMV and for the European Space Agency (ESA) for [[six years|Year]] before being selected as an [[astronaut|Astronaut]] candidate in [[1992|1992]].

sentence.value: His first spaceflight was as a mission specialist aboard space shuttle mission STS-95, during which Duque supervised ESA experimental modules.
